definition: diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: Scientists now have a genetic map of the potato.
sentences.chinese: 現在，科學家已經擁有了馬鈴薯的基因圖譜。

sentences.english: Today, we have access to our own genetic recipe.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我們已經繪製了自己的基因圖譜。

sentences.english: Now, scientists have a full genetic map of the soybean.
sentences.chinese: 現在科學家擁有大豆的整個基因圖譜。

sentences.english: Maps just crossed that threshold. Genetics is about to.
sentences.chinese: 地圖剛剛跨過了這道門檻，基因圖譜也快了。

sentences.english: The scientists mapped the genes of the viruses taken from two of the civets .
sentences.chinese: 科學家繪製了取自兩隻果子狸的病毒的基因圖譜。

sentences.english: The first complete genetic map was published in 2007.
sentences.chinese: 首次完整的基因圖譜在2007年出版。
